= Introduction =

This page highlights the setup instructions to get the biblestudygroupatlas application
running on your pc.


= Details =

Step-by-step instructions:
  * Download maven http://maven.apache.org/download.html
  * Download svn client - tortoisesvn will do...http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ 
  * Checkout thirdparty modules - web scraping tool webharvest from svn repository
    https://web-harvest.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/web-harvest

 * Checkout thirdparty modules - wicket stuff modules from wicket-1.3.x branch - needed  module - wicket-contrib-gmap2
    https://wicket-stuff.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/wicket-stuff/branches/wicket-1.3.x

* Checkout thirdparty modules from svn repository https://crosswire.org/svn/jsword/trunk
  -needed modules are common and jsword
